import React,{useState} from "react" function AddProduct() { const[{alt,src}, setImg] = useState({ src: '../images/product/1.png', alt: "Upload Image" }) let fileRef = React.createRef() const handleImg = (e) => { if(e.target.files[0]) { setImg({ src: URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]), alt: e.target.files[0].name }) } } const tiggerClick = ()=> { fileRef.current.click() } return (
*image 1
) } export default AddProduct
